solution_line_template: The castle uses {mary_dragon_paint} + {mike_more_than_mary} = <<{mary_dragon_paint}+{mike_more_than_mary}={mike_castle_paint}>>{mike_castle_paint} square feet of paint.
The sun uses {total_paint} - {mary_dragon_paint} - {mike_castle_paint} = <<{total_paint}-{mary_dragon_paint}-{mike_castle_paint}={sun_paint}>>{sun_paint} square feet of paint.
